## golab group ls

List groups

### Synopsis


Get a list of visible groups for the authenticated user.

```
golab group ls [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help         help for ls
  -s, --statistics   (optional) if set to true, additional statistics are shown (admin only)
```
